front.title: Gap analysis on the EAP keying hierarchy

abstract.t: The extensible authentication protocol (EAP) keying framework [1] leaves out guidelines for using the extended master session key (EMSK) for future discussion and specification. While the keying framework does provide guidance for EAP master session key (MSK) usage, some SDOs use that key in a non-compliant manner. This document provides a description and analysis of MSK and EMSK usage and provides an outline for a discussion on these topics.
